data.actual_result: Scrolling jumps back to the top everytime you hit the bottom
data.expected_result: Scolling should go to the bottom and stop
data.short_description: Scrolling in a role list all the way down makes it jump back to the top
data.steps_to_repro: - Create enough roles to scroll - Click and hold a role from the top - Drag the role to the bottom of the screen until it starts to scroll to the bottom - Watch it jump back up over and over when you hit the bottom
